{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DI-713 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date=2000 |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |manuf=AMIT |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand= |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=DE-9 |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=3 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |addl_chips= |default_ssid=default |default_ssid_regex=^default$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} {{TagLine|Wireless Gateway & Access Point plus Switch}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=D-Link|model=DI-713}}{{â€¢}} [ftp://ftp.dlink.com/Gateway/di713/ Downloads on D-Link's FTP server] This device is probably near identical (minus the printer port) to the [[D-Link DI-713P rev A1|D-Link DI-713P]] and other early AMIT 802.11b routers. [http://www.practicallynetworked.com/review.asp?pid=305 An ancient review by Tim Higgins for the DI-713 on Practically Networked] :[http://www.practicallynetworked.com/item.asp?pid=305 Some specifications]
Default settings (including the SSID) are per '''D-Link''''s manual. :The sample MAC in the manual has a 00:50:18 ('''AMIT''') OUI.
